displayName: Block persistence through WMI event subscription
description: When set to Block, persistence through WMI is blocked. When set to Audit only, how this rule affects your organization if its enabled (set to Block) is evaluated. Setting to Not Configured will return the setting to Windows default, which is off and persistence is not blocked. This attack surface reduction (ASR) rule is controlled via the following GUID: e6db77e5-3df2-4cf1-b95a-636979351e5b
